compatibility.notes: LAL-1.2 has a strong copyleft nature, meaning that any derivative works or combined works must also be licensed under LAL-1.2. Care should be taken when combining with licenses that have permissive terms.

key_requirements: The original work must be attributed to the original author.
Any modifications must be clearly stated.
All derived works must be licensed under the same terms.
license.name: LAL-1.2
obligations: Contributors must disclose their contributions under the same license.
All copies and derivative works must include the original license.
Attribution to the original author must be maintained.
